main event: A UFO sighting was reported near St. Peters, Illinois on November 2, 1963, involving a self-luminous object observed on ground radar.
interesting points: The object was stationary and hovered approximately 1-1/2 miles north of St. Peters., The sighting lasted for 15 minutes with three objects involved., The object emitted fluctuating lights of variable intensity., Observations were made by an airline pilot and co-pilot., The weather was clear at the time of the observation.
sighted object: self-luminous object observed on ground radar
